productTable: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Product( ProductId varchar(255), ProductName varchar(255), Cost float, SubCategory varchar(255), offer varchar(255))
insertProductTable: INSERT INTO Product(ProductId, ProductName, Cost, SubCategory, offer) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
productOffers: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ProductOffers(OfferId varchar(255) NOT NULL,ProductId varchar(255),Offer float,StartDate varchar(255),EndDate varchar(255))
